name: Heartist dreams as will and idea!

metadata.name: Heartist dreams as will and idea!
metadata.description: Vasan Sittikhet created the ideal world with his creation. Dream, Love and Hope merge as one with life that connects with society, with one another, with nature and earth. This important work of Vasan brings his one-and-only identity as “Artivist” activist-driven artist fighting for society, nature, environment and justice. In Heartist dreams as will and idea! (2022-2023) Vasan invites us to take a ride into his intriguing imagination.
